15 inline double db_to_raw_gain(const double db_val)
16 {
17 return pow(10.0, db_val / 20.0);
18 }
19
26 inline float db_to_raw_gain(const float db_val)
27 {
28 return powf(10.0f, db_val / 20.0f);
29 }
30
39 inline double db_to_raw_gain_off(const double db_val, const double db_threshold)
40 {
41 if (db_val <= db_threshold)
42 {
43 return 0.0;
44 }
45 else
46 {
47 return db_to_raw_gain(db_val);
48 }
49 }

59 inline float db_to_raw_gain_off(const float db_val, const double db_threshold)
60 {
61 if (db_val <= db_threshold)
62 {
63 return 0.0f;
64 }
65 else
66 {
67 return db_to_raw_gain(db_val);
68 }
69 }

77 inline double raw_gain_to_db(const double raw_gain)
78 {
79 return 20.0 * log10(raw_gain);
80 }
81
88 inline float raw_gain_to_db(const float raw_gain)
89 {
90 return 20.0f * log10f(raw_gain);
91 }
